TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class ExpressionTextBox : System.Windows.Controls.UserControl, System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExpressionTextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.UserControl implements class System.Windows.Markup.IComponentConnector
Public NotInheritable Class ExpressionTextBox Inherits UserControl Implements IComponentConnector
public ref class ExpressionTextBox sealed : System::Windows::Controls::UserControl, System::Windows::Markup::IComponentConnector

summary.span: 描述一个使用户能够在活动设计器中编辑表达式的控件。

span.span: Describes a control that enables the user to edit an expression in an activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Studio 中，编辑表达式时提供功能，例如 IntelliSense。In Visual Studio, the provides features such as IntelliSense when editing an expression. 此类功能由一个称作可承载编辑器的组件提供。Such features are provided by a component called the hostable editor. 表达式编辑接口可扩展，用于编辑表达式的编辑器可替换。The expression editing interface is extensible and the editor used for editing expressions can be replaced. > [!NOTE] > 此组件不是可在正在 Visual Studio 外部重新承载的应用程序中使用。This component is not available for use in applications that are being re-hosted outside Visual Studio. **ExpressionTextBlock**时您编辑表达式时，按以下方式工作原理。**ExpressionTextBlock** works in the following manner when you edit an expression. 1. 当你单击**ExpressionTextBox**、创建对象以及可承载编辑器会话在 Visual Studio 中实例化。When you click on an **ExpressionTextBox**, an object is created and a hostable editor session is instantiated in Visual Studio. 2. 在可承载编辑器中键入内容时，请注意这些功能有两类可用性。When you type inside a hostable editor, note that the features have two sorts of availability. 1. IntelliSense、完成和着色支持立即可用。IntelliSense, completion and colorization support is available immediately. 2. 验证在后台调用，须在短时延迟后才可用。Validation is called in the background and is available only after a short interval of time elapses. 然后，如果表达式无效，则承载的编译器会报告错误并在表达式右侧显示红色错误图标。Then, if your expression is invalid, the hosted compiler reports the error and the red error icon displays to the right of your expression. 3. 按**Enter**密钥时**ExpressionTextBox**具有焦点插入新行中的对象。Press the **Enter** key when the **ExpressionTextBox** has the focus to insert new lines in the object. 这样可在可承载编辑器中进行行提交，从而实现错落有致的行排列。This causes a line commit to occur inside the hostable editor, which triggers a pretty listing and the display of squiggles. 4. 编辑器实例被销毁时**ExpressionTextBox**失去焦点时，显示将恢复到**TextBlock**。The editor instance is destroyed when the **ExpressionTextBox** loses the focus, and the display reverts to a **TextBlock**. 如果位于设计器图面上或属性网格中，则会提交对模型项的更改并且同步显示同一表达式的所有 控件。If you are on the designer surface or in the property grid, the change to the model item is committed and all controls displaying that same expression are synchronized. 但是，如果位于对话框中，单击“确定”后才会提交对模型项的更改。However, if you are in a dialog box, the change to the model item is not committed until you click OK. 提交模型项后，会调用 并验证整个工作流。When the model item is committed, is invoked and the entire workflow is validated. 5. 当你单击**ExpressionTextBox**再次，创建一个新的编辑器实例。When you click on the **ExpressionTextBox** again, a new editor instance is created. 在可承载编辑器中，开始编辑前即会出现错落有致的行排列和着色效果。In the hostable editor, pretty listing, colorization, and squiggling occurs before you begin editing. 若要将绑定到表达式文本框**OwnerActivity**，使用正确设置数据上下文。To bind the expression text box to **OwnerActivity**, use to set the data context correctly. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置绑定到正确的数据上下文**OwnerActivity**。The following code sample demonstrates setting the data context correctly for binding to **OwnerActivity**. ``` ``` 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and . 另请参阅[自定义活动设计器中使用 ExpressionTextBox](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-expressiontextbox-in-a-custom-activity-designer.md)示例主题。Also see the [Using the ExpressionTextBox in a Custom Activity Designer](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-expressiontextbox-in-a-custom-activity-designer.md) sample topic. ## Examples 在创建自定义活动设计器时，通常以声明方式使用 。The is usually used declaratively when creating custom activity designers. 有关示例代码，请参阅[ExpressionTextBox101](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=193145)博客。For sample code, see the [ExpressionTextBox101](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=193145) blog.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event EditorLostLogicalFocus As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: 在表达式编辑器失去逻辑焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the expression editor loses logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有意通过某个方法调用强制失去了焦点，而前一个键盘焦点位于不同的范围内，则逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点不同。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 总是必需的。 is always required. 使用时以声明方式若要将绑定到自变量，你必须始终使用将表达式绑定到自变量，设置`ConverterParameter`到`In`或`Out`具体取决于自变量方向。When using the declaratively to bind to arguments, you must always use the to bind the expression to the argument, setting the `ConverterParameter` to `In` or `Out` depending on the direction of the argument.

summary.span: 获取或设置表达式类型。

value.span: 返回一个包含表达式类型的 。

span.span: Returns a that contains the expression type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强烈建议设置类型。Setting the type is strongly recommended. 如果不设置 ，就不能使用 绑定到委托类型，并且不能从承载的编译器进行验证。If you do not set , you can’t use the to bind to delegate types and you do not get validation from the hosted compiler. 此编译器验证检查以查看所输入表达式的类型匹配预期的类型，并且周围显示一个红色框**ExpressionTextBox**活动设计器上向其中输入无效数据时。This compiler validation checks to see if the type of the entered expression matches the expected type, and displays a red box around the **ExpressionTextBox** when invalid data is entered into it on an activity designer.

summary.span: 将事件和名称附加到已编译的内容。

span.span: Attaches events and names to compiled content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类仅供标记编译器使用。This class is intended for use only by the markup compiler.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseLocationExpression { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，确定此实例是否使用位置表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether this instance uses the location expression.

value.span: 如果此实例使用位置表达式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this instance uses the location expression; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A*位置表达式*（或左值表达式） 是一种计算结果为标识符，并将其置于赋值语句的左侧的表达式。A *location expression* (or L-value expression) is a type of expression that evaluates to an identifier and can be placed on the left hand side of an assignment statement. 当你正在绑定到`Out`自变量，会将此属性设置为`True`。When you are binding the to an `Out` argument, you would set this property to `True`.

Public Shared ReadOnly UseLocationExpressionProperty As DependencyProperty
